person.persName: Lewis B. Grigsby (Clark County, Kentucky, attorney and soldier)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, attorney and soldier. Kentucky native. Member of the Democratic Party in 1858. Attorney in Clark County in 1860. Colonel of the 24th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from 1861 to August 1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, p. 18; "Democratic Meeting in Clark County," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), November 3, 1858, p. 1; The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), July 28, 1866, p. 1; The Maysville Weekly Bulletin (Maysville, Ky.), August 6, 1863, p. 3; The Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), May 30, 1882, p. 3.
